extendedInfo.description: Quick access to online Metal reference www.metal-archives.comIf anybody is interested in contributing with a more metal looking logo, feel free to drop me an e-mail.

reviews.title: User friendly
reviews.comment: Quick simple and easy to use. Great app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: Amazing job. Dead simple and very easy to use. Keep up the good work.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Hopefully they will fix this half assed app
reviews.comment: Members doesn\'t work, needs similar artist tab, and just should be more similar to the website. Takes some getting used too but I think I\'ll stick to using my browser for my metal archives needs.
reviews.author: Robert Diaz

reviews.title: flaws
reviews.comment: only pulls up discography members are greyed out and can\'t be seen, why?
reviews.author: George Tokarz

reviews.comment: Minimal security req\'s, awesome. Great info! I give it 5 \\m/\'s
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Great app. Good for reading album reviews etc... would be better if album artwork was larger. On my GS3
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Update!
reviews.comment: This app is always my go to for any info on the metal I listen to. But there\'s alot of things that need a serious update. Ever since the actual site got revamped this app fell behind and looks to be abandoned. Please fix and it\'s back to 5 stars.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good decent app
reviews.comment: Good descent app although I notice some band names are missing and the reviews are a bit harsh.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: As excellent as the album A Rose for the Apocalypse.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wow
reviews.comment: This app has had it problems in the past but they were fixed. However, now I can\'t even look up anything without getting an error.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: AWESOME MAN! My favorite Metal Site has it\'s own app!
reviews.comment: You guys not only own the Internet in all things Metal, but now have a sweet app I just found on the market too! Just wanted to say thanks for making this, now I don\'t need to browse the net. I can just open up the app whenever I want. ENCYCLOPEDIA METALLUM, \\mm/ \"Metal is their Business, & Business is good!\" \\mm/ [ \\mm/ = too much Metal.... for one hand ]
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Please fix!
reviews.comment: Love this app and use it every day but for some reason the band labels are URLs now and I can\'t tell which band is which until I press each one individually and it\'s getting reeallly annoying!  Please fix this ASAP so I can give the app the 5 stars it deserves!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Broken
reviews.comment: I only use the band search function with MA.  With this app it simply does not work.  After fetching results the app will force close on you... Browsing for an artist takes far too long.  for now this app os useless (Samsung Infuse).
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Once worked
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t open. Just fc. Desire. Miui 2.2.24 Back to 5 star once it works again.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Could be better
reviews.comment: Why can\'t you see current & past lineups??
reviews.author: Skunjo NC

reviews.title: Members???
reviews.comment: What happened to the members section?? I can\'t view the members anymore!! Please fix this and i\'ll give it a 5 star again! Thanks!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: Anyone who likes metal should totally DL this. I think the logo should totally be more metal, but other than that, I have no complaints. METAL CHICK FOR LIFE \\m/
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Constantly crashes with array index out of bounds exceptions. Disappointing.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Love this app. Lately it has been crashing when I search for a band. Is anyone else having this problem?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: sorry. Hit wrong button. Just wanted to re-5 star it. Cheers!
reviews.author: A Google User
